children.name: Angular
children.description: Angular is a framework for building client web-apps.

children.name: Polymer
children.description: Use polymer to build structured, encapsulated, client-side web apps with web components.

children.name: uix
children.description: Library to build Web User Interfaces in Dart inspired by React.

children.name: Redstone
children.description: Redstone is a server-side, metadata driven micro-framework for Dart.

children.name: Start
children.description: Sinatra inspired web framework to serve static files, handle dynamic requests, websockets and create JSON responses.

children.name: Express
children.description: A simple, thin expressjs inspired layer around Dart's primitive HttpServer APIs.

children.name: Shelf
children.description: Shelf makes it easy to create and compose web servers and parts of web servers.

children.name: Force
children.description: A real time web framework, embracing websockets, making communication even better

children.name: Vane
children.description: Framework with built-in server runtime environment and middleware system

children.name: Rikulo Stream
children.description: Lightweight web server with request routing, filtering, template engine, WebSocket, MVC design pattern, and file-based static resources

children.name: StageXL
children.description: StageXL offers an easy to use and complete API (based on the Flash API) for impressive 2D content like games and other rich applications.

children.name: DartRocket
children.description: DartRocket is a HTML5 game framework written in Dart and which uses the StageXL rendering engine.

children.name: Pixi Dart
children.description: A port of the pixi.js rendering engine.

children.name: Ranger
children.description: A game engine centered around HTML5 Canvas and a scene graph.

children.name: Universal Tween Engine
children.description: A port of the original java Universal Tween Engine created by Aurelien Ribbon.

children.name: Spine Dart
children.description: An implementation of the Esoteric Software Spine runtime.

children.name: mustache4dart
children.description: A simple implementation of Mustache.

children.name: jaded
children.description: Port of the excellent Jade view engine.

children.name: SQLJockey
children.description: MySQL connector.

children.name: PostgreSQL
children.description: PostgreSQL database driver

children.name: dartabase_model
children.description: Serverside Database Object Models for simple data manipulation using MySQL/PGSQL without having to write SQL

children.name: dartabase_migration
children.description: Serverside Database migration for simple version controlled database structure manipulation using MySQL/PGSQL without having to write SQL

children.name: Pub
children.description: Pub is used to manage packages.

children.name: Flutter
children.description: Flutter is a new way to build high-performance, cross-platform mobile apps, allowing you to write applications for Android and iOS.

children.name: Quiver
children.description: A set of utility libraries that makes using many libraries easier and more convenient, or adds additional functionality.

children.name: route_hierarchical
children.description: Route is a client routing library for Dart that helps make building single-page web apps.

children.name: Archive
children.description: A library to encode and decode various archive and compression formats.

children.name: Frappe
children.description: A functional reactive programming library for Dart. Frapp√© extends the functionality of Dart's streams, and introduces new concepts like properties/signals.

children.name: DI
children.description: Dependency Injection framework by Angular

children.name: html
children.description: A library for working with HTML documents. Previously known as html5lib.

children.name: markdown
children.description: Parse markdown into HTML on both the client and server.

children.name: PetitParser
children.description: PetitParser combines ideas from scannerless parsing, parser combinators, parsing expression grammars and packrat parsers to model grammars and parsers as objects that can be reconfigured dynamically.

children.name: XML
children.description: A lightweight library for parsing, traversing, querying and building XML documents.

children.name: xmlstream
children.description: A streaming event-based XML Parser.

children.name: YAML
children.description: A parser for YAML.

children.name: Constrain
children.description: Provides a constraint based Validation library inspired by Java Bean Validation but leveraging the superior language capabilities of Dart.

children.name: validator.dart
children.description: String validation and sanitization for Dart.

children.name: Objectory
children.description: Objectory provides typed, checked environment to model, save and query data persisted on MongoDb.

children.name: image
children.description: Provides server and web apps the ability to load, manipulate, and save images with various image file formats including PNG, JPEG, GIF, WebP, TIFF, TGA, PSD, PVR, and OpenEXR.

children.name: cassowary
children.description: Implements a subset of the functionality described in the Cassowary paper.  Accepts constraints and updates member variables in an attempt to satisfy the same.

children.name: Guinness
children.description: A port of the Jasmine library.

children.name: test
children.description: Provides a standard way of writing and running tests in Dart.

children.name: Observatory
children.description: Observatory is a tool for profiling and debugging your Dart applications.

children.name: dart2js
children.description: compiles Dart code to JavaScript

children.name: js2dart
children.description: compiles Javascript code to Dart

children.name: Stagehand
children.description: A project scaffolding generator, inspired by tools like Web Starter Kit and Yeoman.

children.name: Crossdart
children.description: Cross-referenced source code of the packages from Pub.

children.name: Crossdart Github Chrome Extension
children.description: Adds "Go to declaration" and "Find Usages" functionality to your Dart projects on Github (both in tree views and pull requests).

children.name: gulp-dart
children.description: A gulp plugin for compiling Dart code to JavaScript using dart2js.

children.name: Hello Dart
children.description: A playful introduction to Dart.

children.name: Darrrt
children.description: Web app code lab.

children.name: IntelliJ Plugin
children.description: Dart plugin from JetBrains for WebStorm, IntelliJ IDEA, PhpStorm, PyCharm, and RubyMine.

children.name: Sublime Text Package
children.description: Sublime Text 3 Dart Package

children.name: Eclipse Plugin
children.description: Dart plugin for Eclipse.

children.name: Emacs Plugin
children.description: An Emacs mode for the Dart language

children.name: Vim Plugin
children.description: Syntax highlighting for Dart in Vim

children.name: Atom Plugin
children.description: Dart support for Atom.

children.name: DartPad
children.description: Online lightweight editor.
